"Search for Teams Seeking Members":
"If you open the Main Menu with , select \"Communication\", then select \"Search for Teams Seeking Members\", you can view a list of Teams which are actively looking for new members.

From this list, you can view detailed information about each Team, and you can send Team applications to their Managers."

"As a Team Master, you can make your own Team appear on this list by opening the Main Menu, selecting \"Communication\", then \"Team Commands\" then \"Team Settings\", and checking the <yellow>Recruiting Team Members<c> box."
